script:
<script> insert into ${tableColumnInfo.tableName} <trim prefix="(" suffix=")" suffixOverrides=",">
<if test="record.${columnInfo.propertyName} != null"> ${columnInfo.columnName} </if>
</trim> values <trim prefix="(" suffix=")" suffixOverrides=",">
<if test="record.${columnInfo.propertyName} != null"> #@{record.${columnInfo.propertyName}} </if>
</trim> </script>
